title: Using generic method with an interface as a constraint type
This is an example of how to use the generic type TFood inside Eat method on the class Animal

title: It won’t be possible because the object lion does not implement the interface IFood. Attempting to make the above call will generate a compiler error: “The type ‘Carnivore’ cannot be used as type parameter ‘TFood’ in the generic type or method ‘Animal.Eat(TFood)’. There is no implicit reference conversion from ‘Carnivore’ to ‘IFood’.”

inline_content.Text: It won’t be possible because the object lion does not implement the interface IFood.
